CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_info (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "ready" BOOLEAN, "structureVersion" VARCHAR, "version" VARCHAR, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure
INSERT INTO _content_info VALUES ('checksum_content', false, 'gOiweT3I65Y4ZplYrqMWx0wAcuXXeuh-NpUAQNtdT5A', 'v3.5.0--aR95Uiz1ZVNcoap96S4MovJnFbBdDdBwfcTikdWRYHU', 'tGUlGQRPh8Ao0sFbMfc9G_v4BrcDyhaI8ylJbmtLV2U'); -- meta
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS _content_content; -- structure
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS _content_content (id TEXT PRIMARY KEY, "title" VARCHAR, "body" TEXT, "credits" VARCHAR NULL, "description" VARCHAR, "extension" VARCHAR, "meta" TEXT, "navigation" TEXT DEFAULT true, "path" VARCHAR, "quests" TEXT NULL, "seo" TEXT DEFAULT '{}', "ship_day" VARCHAR NULL, "stem" VARCHAR, "tl" INT NULL, "__hash__" TEXT UNIQUE); -- structure
